amendment.description: Page 3, beginning on line 4, strike "Protecting Americans with Preexisting Conditions Act of 2019" and insert "Insert Politically Punchy Title That Doesn't Reflect the Bill Substance Act".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 116-51 to change the title of bill to "Insert Politically Punchy Title That Doesn't Reflect the Bill Substance Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holding amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 237 (Roll no. 192).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holding amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 237 (Roll no. 192).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Holding.
